entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:19 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Snow or rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
